name: Ancient Mandriano
description: The Ancient Mandriano is a Huge plant creature with impressive physical attributes. Its robust structure and ability to manipulate life and death make it a significant threat. It grapples and drains the essence of its foes, before raising them as undead, commanding them to serve its dark purposes.
memorable: The ability to drain life and control up to twenty zombies makes this creature especially terrifying as an army commander and a controller of death.
goals: Seeks to dominate and manipulate life and death, often raising the dead to serve its purposes.
relations: May be encountered alongside other undead or plants that serve similar dark purposes.
environment: Typically found in dark forests, graveyards, or areas tainted by death.
strengths: High Strength provides powerful melee capabilities and the ability to deal double damage to structures.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire and less agile due to low Dexterity.
attacks: Uses multiattack with powerful swipe attacks that can grapple medium or smaller creatures.
most_powerful_ability: Consume the Spark allows it to drain life and potentially raise the dead as undead servants.
senses: Has a passive perception of 13, allowing it to notice its surroundings effectively.
skills: Proficient in athletics, perception, and stealth, capable of grappling and noticing enemies.
additional_information: Immunities to poison and exhaustion enhance its durability.
Can control up to twelve undead simultaneously.
Can animate zombies from humanoid corpses three times a day.
